title: Just Love Maxi Dress with Front Zipper Summer Dresses
features: STUN IN THE SUN: Look amazing when catching those rays with Just Love’s casual maxi dress. You’ll love the stylish racerback, eye-catching heathered colors, and a functional zipper at the front that gives you the power to make the summer maxi dress as as you’d like.

ALL DAY COMFORT: Whether you’re out running errands or on an afternoon lunch, you’ll relish the comfortable fabric of these ladies maxi dresses. We’ve made them using a mix of 65% polyester and 35% rayon that feels great on the skin and keeps you nice & cool all day.

DESIGNED FOR A GREAT FIT: Whatever your body size, you’ll find the perfect fitting open back maxi dress from our wide range of sizes. The lovely drape of the jersey knit fabric creates a striking silhouette to complement your shape and make you stylishly stand out.

HIGH-QUALITY DESIGN: Our pretty maxi dresses are carefully made to give you a garment you’ll proudly wear out. Everything from the stitching to the hem lining is beautifully done for a clean look, and the knit dresses for women handle well in the wash without stretching out of shape.

EXPERIENCE GREAT VALUE: Just Love is all about giving you the latest fashion at the best prices around. Enjoy summer dresses designed with supreme comfort, great quality, and unique style in mind, all without breaking the bank. Click ‘Add to Cart’ now!
description: TURN UP THE STYLE WITH OUR SEXY MAXI DRESS

Nothing says summer like a great maxi dress. And you’ll love our simple yet elegant take on this fashion staple! Designed to strike the perfect balance between beautiful and sexy, this casual dress will make any outing a truly stylish affair. The racerback strap is a lovely complement to the length, the jersey knit fabric creates a beautiful drape, and there is even a functional zipper at the front that allows you to turn up the sexiness whenever you want. Choose from our lovely collection of heathered colors and stand out whenever you step out.

Fit is everything when it comes to making a dress really pop. We’ve designed our maxis in the widest range of sizes to accommodate just about any body shape. Available in S-3X, you’ll find the perfect-fitting maxi to complement your figure and make you feel confidently beautiful as you strut about town. And you’re in for a taste of incredible comfort too! The jersey knit fabric made using 65% polyester and 35% rayon not only feels great on the skin but also keeps you comfortably cool as you enjoy that day out.
Here’s why you’ll love these casual summer dresses:
- Handle beautifully in the wash without stretching out of shape.
- Made with great attention to detail to create a beautiful, clean look.
- Can be dressed up or dressed down to suit any casual engagement.
- Come in a choice of beautiful solid colors accentuated by heather fabric.
- Competitively priced to give you great value for money.
Slip into a maxi dress that combines simple elegance, supreme comfort, and unrivaled bang for your
